content.text:
# Florida Film Critics Circle Awards 2020

25th FFCC Awards
December 21, 2020
----
Best Picture:
First Cow
The 25th Florida Film Critics Circle Awards were held on December 21, 2020.
The nominations were announced on December 17, 2020, led by Nomadland and Minari with six nominations each.
Winners and nominees
, Best Director winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
, Best Adapted Screenplay winner]]
, Breakout Award winner]]
Winners are listed at the top of each list in bold, while the runner-ups for each category are listed under them.
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-
! style="width=50%"| Best Picture
! style="width=50%"| Best Director
|-
| valign="top"|
First Cow
* Runner-up: Minari
* Runner-up: Nomadland
* Runner-up: The Trial of the Chicago 7
| valign="top"|
'Chloé Zhao – Nomadland'
* Runner-up: Kelly Reichardt – First Cow
* Runner-up: Aaron Sorkin – The Trial of the Chicago 7
** Lee Isaac Chung – Minari
** Florian Zeller – The Father
|-
! style="width=50%"| Best Actor
! style="width=50%"| Best Actress
|-
| valign="top"|
'Anthony Hopkins – The Father as Anthony'
* Runner-up: John Magaro – First Cow as Otis "Cookie" Figowitz
** Riz Ahmed – Sound of Metal as Ruben Stone
** Chadwick Boseman – ''Ma Rainey's Black Bottom as Levee Green
| valign="top"|
'Frances McDormand – Nomadland as Fern'
* Runner-up: Viola Davis – Ma Rainey's Black Bottom as Ma Rainey
* Runner-up: Carey Mulligan – Promising Young Woman as Cassandra "Cassie" Thomas
** Carrie Coon – The Nest'' as Allison O'Hara
** Elisabeth Moss – Shirley as Shirley Jackson
|-
! style="width=50%"| Best Supporting Actor
! style="width=50%"| Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top"|
'Paul Raci – Sound of Metal as Joe'
* Runner-up: Brian Dennehy – Driveways as Del
** Sacha Baron Cohen – The Trial of the Chicago 7 as Abbie Hoffman
** Chadwick Boseman – Da 5 Bloods as "Stormin'" Norman Earl Holloway
** Bill Murray – On the Rocks as Felix Keane
| valign="top"|
'Maria Bakalova – Borat Subsequent Moviefilm as Tutar Sagdiyev'
* Runner-up: Youn Yuh-jung – Minari as Soon-ja
** Jane Adams – She Dies Tomorrow as Jane
** Charlene Swankie – Nomadland as Swankie
|-
! style="width=50%"| Best Adapted Screenplay
! style="width=50%"| Best Original Screenplay
|-
| valign="top"|
'Charlie Kaufman – I'm Thinking of Ending Things'
* Runner-up: Chloé Zhao – Nomadland
* Runner-up: Ruben Santiago-Hudson – ''Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
** Jonathan Raymond and Kelly Reichardt – First Cow
** Florian Zeller and Christopher Hampton – The Father

* Runner-up: Aaron Sorkin – The Trial of the Chicago 7

** Emerald Fennell – Promising Young Woman
** Jack Fincher – Mank

! style="width=50%"| Best Documentary Film

Mangrove
